description: Partial quotients in continued fraction expansion of Cahen's constant.
comments: Shifted squares of denominators of convergents to Cahen's constant: a(n) = A006279(n-2)^2 for n > 1. - _Jonathan Sondow_, Aug 20 2014
references: J. L. Davison, Jeffrey Shallit, Continued Fractions for Some Alternating Series, Monatsh. Math., 111 (1991), 119-126.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
